artist: Painter: After Jan Lievens; Engraver: After Paul Pontius (Du Pont); Engraver: Peter de Jode, the Younger; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: half length portrait, facing left, holding a sheet of paper; wearing a black cloak and robe; copy in reverse of engraving by Paulus Pontius of painting by Jan Lievens
inscription:
Signature, Title,  and Inscription

Below image in black: 55  DANIEL SEGERS FRERE IESUITS / followed by 6 lines in French, Un de premiers painctres .../.../ des Peres Iesuites. / I. Leivens pinxit   I Meyssens excudit

title: Portrait of Daniel Segers
